properties.description: SCD Type1 with Delete and Upsert
SCD Type1 with Alter Row. Insert and Update using Upsert

source.sqlReaderQuery: SELECT TableName,WatermarkValue FROM WatermarkTable WHERE TableName = '[dbo].[Orders_Src]'

sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT * FROM [dbo].[Orders_Src]
WHERE OrderDate > '@{activity('StartTime').output.firstRow.WatermarkValue}'
AND
OrderDate <= '@{activity('EndTime').output.firstRow.mDate}'

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		PurchaseOrderID as integer,
		RevisionNumber as integer,
		Status as integer,
		EmployeeID as integer,
		VendorID as integer,
		ShipMethodID as integer,
		OrderDate as timestamp,
		ShipDate as timestamp,
		SubTotal as decimal(19,4),
		TaxAmt as decimal(19,4),
		Freight as decimal(19,4),
		TotalDue as decimal(19,4),
		ModifiedDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> POH
POH derive(Year = year(OrderDate),
		Quarter = case(month(OrderDate) >= 1 && month(OrderDate) <= 3, 'Q1',
    month(OrderDate) >= 4 && month(OrderDate) <= 6, 'Q2',
    month(OrderDate) >= 7 && month(OrderDate) <= 9, 'Q3', 'Q4'  
),
		Month = month(OrderDate)) ~> YearMonthQuarter
YearMonthQuarter aggregate(groupBy(Year,
		Quarter,
		Month,
		EmployeeID,
		VendorID),
	{Avg(SubTotal)} = avg(SubTotal),
		{Avg(TaxAmt)} = avg(TaxAmt),
		{Avg(Freight)} = avg(Freight),
		{Avg(TotalDue)} = avg(TotalDue)) ~> Avg
Avg sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		Year,
		Quarter,
		Month,
		EmployeeID,
		VendorID,
		{Avg(SubTotal)},
		{Avg(TaxAmt)},
		{Avg(Freight)},
		{Avg(TotalDue)}
	)) ~> POFactAvg

source(output(
		PurchaseOrderID as integer,
		RevisionNumber as integer,
		Status as integer,
		EmployeeID as integer,
		VendorID as integer,
		ShipMethodID as integer,
		OrderDate as timestamp,
		ShipDate as timestamp,
		SubTotal as decimal(19,4),
		TaxAmt as decimal(19,4),
		Freight as decimal(19,4),
		TotalDue as decimal(19,4),
		ModifiedDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> POH
POH derive(Year = year(OrderDate),
		Quarter = case(month(OrderDate) > 4, 'Q1', month(OrderDate) > 7, 'Q2',month(OrderDate) > 10, 'Q3','Q4'),
		Month = month(OrderDate)) ~> YMQ
YMQ filter(Year == 2012) ~> Year2012
Year2012 split(Quarter == 'Q1',
	Quarter == 'Q2',
	Quarter == 'Q3',
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplitQtr@(Q1, Q2, Q3, Q4)
ConditionalSplitQtr@Q1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> POHQ1
ConditionalSplitQtr@Q2 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> POHQ2
ConditionalSplitQtr@Q3 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> POHQ3
ConditionalSplitQtr@Q4 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> POHQ4

source(output(
		OrderID as integer,
		CustomerID as string,
		EmployeeID as integer,
		OrderDate as timestamp,
		OrdAmt as decimal(19,4)
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> OrdersSrc
source(output(
		OrderID as integer,
		CustomerID as string,
		EmployeeID as integer,
		OrderDate as timestamp,
		OrdAmt as decimal(19,4)
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> OrdersTar
OrdersTar select(mapColumn(
		OrderID_Lkp = OrderID,
		CustomerID_Lkp = CustomerID,
		EmployeeID_Lkp = EmployeeID,
		OrderDate_Lkp = OrderDate,
		OrdAmt_Lkp = OrdAmt
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectTar
OrdersSrc, SelectTar lookup(OrderID == OrderID_Lkp,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Lookup1
Lookup1 filter(isNull(OrderID_Lkp)) ~> Filter1
Filter1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		OrderID as integer,
		CustomerID as string,
		EmployeeID as integer,
		OrderDate as timestamp,
		OrdAmt as decimal(19,4)
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> OrdertarSink

source(output(
		PurchaseOrderID as integer,
		RevisionNumber as integer,
		Status as integer,
		EmployeeID as integer,
		VendorID as integer,
		ShipMethodID as integer,
		OrderDate as timestamp,
		ShipDate as timestamp,
		SubTotal as decimal(19,4),
		TaxAmt as decimal(19,4),
		Freight as decimal(19,4),
		TotalDue as decimal(19,4),
		ModifiedDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> POH
source(output(
		PurchaseOrderID as integer,
		ModifiedDate as timestamp,
		PurchaseOrderDetailID as integer,
		DueDate as timestamp,
		OrderQty as integer,
		ProductID as integer,
		UnitPrice as decimal(19,4),
		LineTotal as decimal(19,4),
		ReceivedQty as decimal(8,2),
		RejectedQty as decimal(8,2),
		StockedQty as decimal(9,2)
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> POD
source(output(
		ModifiedDate as timestamp,
		ProductID as integer,
		Name as string,
		ProductNumber as string,
		MakeFlag as boolean,
		FinishedGoodsFlag as boolean,
		Color as string,
		SafetyStockLevel as integer,
		ReorderPoint as integer,
		StandardCost as decimal(19,4),
		ListPrice as decimal(19,4),
		Size as string,
		SizeUnitMeasureCode as string,
		WeightUnitMeasureCode as string,
		Weight as decimal(8,2),
		DaysToManufacture as integer,
		ProductLine as string,
		Class as string,
		Style as string,
		ProductSubcategoryID as integer,
		ProductModelID as integer,
		SellStartDate as timestamp,
		SellEndDate as timestamp,
		DiscontinuedDate as timestamp,
		rowguid as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> Product
POH, POD join(POH@PurchaseOrderID == POD@PurchaseOrderID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> PurchaseOrderID
PurchaseOrderID select(mapColumn(
		PurchaseOrderID = POH@PurchaseOrderID,
		RevisionNumber,
		Status,
		EmployeeID,
		VendorID,
		ShipMethodID,
		OrderDate,
		ShipDate,
		TaxAmt,
		Freight,
		ModifiedDate = POH@ModifiedDate,
		PurchaseOrderID = POD@PurchaseOrderID,
		ModifiedDate = POD@ModifiedDate,
		DueDate,
		OrderQty,
		ProductID,
		UnitPrice,
		LineTotal,
		ReceivedQty,
		RejectedQty,
		StockedQty
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> POHPOD
POHPOD, ProductSelect join(POHPOD@ProductID == ProductSelect@ProductID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> ProductID
Product select(mapColumn(
		ProductID,
		StandardCost
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> ProductSelect
ProductID sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> PurchaseOrderFact

source(output(
		EmpID as integer,
		EmpName as string,
		Dept as string,
		StartDate as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> EmpSrcType2
source(output(
		EmpID as integer,
		EmpName as string,
		Dept as string,
		Active as integer,
		StartDate as date,
		EndDate as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> EmpTarType2
EmpSrcType2 derive(SrcHashKey = md5(EmpName,Dept)) ~> SrcHashKey
EmpTarType2 derive(TarHashKey = md5(EmpName,Dept)) ~> TarHashKey
SrcHashKey, TarHashKey exists(SrcHashKey == TarHashKey,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> DoesNotExists
TarHashKey, SetActive1 exists(EmpTarType2@EmpID == EmpSrcType2@EmpID
	&& EmpTarType2@EmpName == EmpSrcType2@EmpName,
	negate:false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Exists
DoesNotExists derive(Active = 1,
		EndDate = toDate('9999-12-31')) ~> SetActive1
Exists derive(Active = 0,
		EndDate = toDate(currentUTC())) ~> SetActive0
SetActive0 alterRow(updateIf(true())) ~> UpdateExisting
SetActive1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		EmpID as integer,
		EmpName as string,
		Dept as string,
		Active as integer,
		StartDate as date,
		EndDate as date
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> EmpTarInsert
UpdateExisting sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		EmpID as integer,
		EmpName as string,
		Dept as string,
		Active as integer,
		StartDate as date,
		EndDate as date
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['EmpID','EmpName','Dept'],
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> EmpTarUpdate

source(output(
		OrderID as integer,
		CustomerID as string,
		EmployeeID as integer,
		OrderDate as timestamp,
		OrdAmt as decimal(19,4)
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> OrdSrc
source(output(
		OrderID as integer,
		CustomerID as string,
		EmployeeID as integer,
		OrderDate as timestamp,
		OrdAmt as decimal(19,4)
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> OrdTar
OrdTar select(mapColumn(
		OrderID_Lkp = OrderID,
		CustomerID_Lkp = CustomerID,
		EmployeeID_Lkp = EmployeeID,
		OrderDate_Lkp = OrderDate,
		OrdAmt_Lkp = OrdAmt
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> OrdTarLkp
OrdSrc, OrdTarLkp lookup(OrderID == OrderID_Lkp,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> SrcTarCompare
SrcTarCompare alterRow(upsertIf(true())) ~> UpsertRecords
OrdTar, OrdSrc lookup(OrdTar@OrderID == OrdSrc@OrderID,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> DsntExistInSrc
DsntExistInSrc alterRow(deleteIf(isNull(OrdSrc@OrderID))) ~> AlterRow1
UpsertRecords sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		OrderID as integer,
		CustomerID as string,
		EmployeeID as integer,
		OrderDate as timestamp,
		OrdAmt as decimal(19,4)
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['OrderID'],
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		OrderID,
		CustomerID,
		EmployeeID,
		OrderDate,
		OrdAmt
	)) ~> UpsertOrdTar
AlterRow1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		OrderID as integer,
		CustomerID as string,
		EmployeeID as integer,
		OrderDate as timestamp,
		OrdAmt as decimal(19,4)
	),
	deletable:true,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['OrderID'],
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> DeleteFromOrdTar

source(output(
		OrderID as integer,
		CustomerID as string,
		EmployeeID as integer,
		OrderDate as timestamp,
		OrdAmt as decimal(19,4)
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> OrdSrc
source(output(
		OrderID as integer,
		CustomerID as string,
		EmployeeID as integer,
		OrderDate as timestamp,
		OrdAmt as decimal(19,4)
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> OrdTar
OrdTar select(mapColumn(
		OrderID_Lkp = OrderID,
		CustomerID_Lkp = CustomerID,
		EmployeeID_Lkp = EmployeeID,
		OrderDate_Lkp = OrderDate,
		OrdAmt_Lkp = OrdAmt
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> OrdTarLkp
OrdSrc, OrdTarLkp lookup(OrderID == OrderID_Lkp,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> SrcTarCompare
SrcTarCompare alterRow(upsertIf(true())) ~> UpsertRecords
UpsertRecords sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		OrderID as integer,
		CustomerID as string,
		EmployeeID as integer,
		OrderDate as timestamp,
		OrdAmt as decimal(19,4)
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['OrderID'],
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		OrderID,
		CustomerID,
		EmployeeID,
		OrderDate,
		OrdAmt
	)) ~> UpsertOrdTar

source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> con1Lookup
con1Lookup sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> DB01

source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> Group1
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> Group2
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> Group3
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> OrdersNorthwind
Group1, Group2, Group3, OrdersNorthwind union(byName: true)~> Union1
Union1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> UnionDB
Union1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['UnionGroup.csv'],
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> GroupUnion

source(output(
		EmpID as string,
		EmpName as string,
		Gender as string,
		Salary as string,
		Dept as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> EmpInfoCsv
EmpInfoCsv window(over(Dept),
	asc(Salary, true),
	SalRank = rank(),
		SalDensRank = denseRank()) ~> Window1
Window1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> PartitionDensRank
